description: This file defines a React functional component named PromptInput, which provides a user interface for inputting prompts related to editing images or scenes, likely in a real estate image editing application. It manages user input state, handles form submission asynchronously, and renders a form with a textarea and submit button.

methods.name: PromptInput
methods.description: React functional component that renders an input form for prompts with submit handling and internal state management.
